title: Woman’s Torso, Leg Found At Bronx Waste Transfer Station

organizations.name: leg found at bronx waste transfer station woman
leg found at bronx waste transfer station

text:
Woman’s Torso, Leg Found At Bronx Waste Transfer Station January 17, 2017 1:33 PM Filed Under: The Bronx Police say female remains were found at the Metropolitan Transfer Station in the Bronx (credit: CBS2) 
NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) — A gruesome discovery was made at a waste transfer station in the Bronx early Tuesday morning. 
Police said a woman’s torso and leg were found at the Metropolitan Transfer Station at 287 Halleck St. in Hunts Point around 4:42 a.m. 
The medical examiner will determine the cause of death. 
The investigation is ongoing.
